alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hillsborough County through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brandon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Plant City, Brandon, Fish Hawk, Riverview, Palm River-Clair Mel, East Lake-Orient Park, Greater Sun Center, Valrico, Alafia River State Park, Gibsonton, Palm River, Boyette, Progress Village, Orient Park, Lithia Springs State Park, Bloomingdale, Mango, Dover and Seffner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
